ja: 私立という事もあって、三咲高校の冬休みは早い。
en: Misaki High was a private school, and as such its winter break started earlier than public schools.

ja: 十二月の<半|なか>ばには終業式を<迎|むか>え、校舎と生徒たちはつかの間、二学期までの疲れを癒す事になる。
en: The end-of-term ceremony was in mid-December, followed by a brief respite before the next term began.

ja: 無論。
en: Of course...

ja: 彼らにとっては恒例の関門、幸せな長期休日の前に立ちはだかる<期末試験|みっかかん>を無事に乗り越えられたら、の話であるが。
en: That was if and only if they overcame the classic obstacle lying between them and an extended break from school: final exams.

ja: 深夜放送を受信するラジオ。
en: The radio continued its broadcast late into the night.

ja: <台所|した>まで下りる手間をはぶく、紅茶用の魔法瓶。
en: A thermos of hot tea eliminated the need to venture down to the kitchen.

ja: 冬の寒さから足を守る電気毛布と、夜食のカニパン。
en: An electric blanket kept away the winter cold, and a crab-shaped pastry staved off any dinnertime hunger.

ja: このように。
en: These were the lengths Aoko had gone to.

ja: 青子の部屋は<一分|いちぶ>の<隙|すき>もない、一夜漬け強制空間になっていた。
en: She needed to ensure that every aspect of her surroundings helped her pull a successful all-nighter.

ja: 「期末試験一日目、ご苦労さま。
en: "Congrats on surviving the first day of exams.

ja: それで、生まれ変わる覚悟はできた？」
en: Are you ready to leave your old study habits behind and be reborn as a new student?"

ja: こくこく、と頷く草十郎。
en: Soujuurou nodded earnestly.

ja: アルバイトから戻ってきた彼を待っていたのは、魔術師ではなく、鬼の生徒会長としての蒼崎青子だった。
en: Upon returning from work he encountered not the mage he expected but the demon student council president-Aozaki.

ja: 時をさかのぼること半日前。
en: Half a day earlier.

ja: 期末試験一日目を終え、かねてからの計画を実行しようと洋館に向かう草十郎の前に、
en: The first day of exams were over, and Soujuurou was about to head back to the mansion where he hoped to put his plan into practice, when...

ja: 「今夜、私の部屋で監禁ね。
en: "Tonight, I'm holding you prisoner.

ja: あ、夕方からのアルバイトは当然キャンセル。ちょっと本気で、あの点数はあり得ないから」
en: Your grades are simply unacceptable. Cancel your shift and any other plans you have."

ja: 青い炎に包まれた笑顔が現れたのである。
en: ...a cold, blue grin greeted him in the hallway.

ja: その手にはしわくちゃに握りしめられた静希草十郎のテスト用紙。
en: Clenched in her fist was Soujuurou's exam paper.

ja: おそらく職員室で山城教諭から
en: Mr. Yamashiro had no doubt said,

ja: 『ま、転校してきたばかりだし、しょうがないよね』
en: "He only just transferred. We can't expect miracles."

ja: と見せられたものを、<勢|いきお>い<奪|うば>い取ってきたに違いない。
en: But she had snatched the exam out of the teacher's hands the minute he tried to show her.

ja: かくして、今日まで屋根裏部屋で寝泊りしていた草十郎は、この日にかぎって青子の部屋に通された。
en: That was how Soujuurou had ended up in Aoko's room, instead of the room in the attic to which he was accustomed.

ja: 色々疑問視する点はあるものの、青子とて年頃の女学生である。
en: Though her situation was far from normal, at the end of the day she was an adolescent girl like any other.

ja: 同年代の男子を自分の部屋に立ち入らせることに抵抗はある。
en: Naturally, she felt uncomfortable letting a boy her own age into her room.

ja: が、それ以上に草十郎の答案用紙はあり得なかったのだ。
en: However, his grades were truly something that called for desperate measures.

ja: なので、今日の不機嫌度は五割増し。彼女のこめかみから怒りマークがとれないのも無理からぬ事である。
en: That explained why her mood was even worse than normal today and the vein on her forehead was pulsing visibly with anger.

ja: 「先に自分の復習、済ませる。
en: "I need to finish my own studies first.

ja: アンタはそのテーブル使ってて」
en: You can use that table in the meantime."

ja: 青子はテーブルに背を向け、愛用の机に向かった。
en: Aoko turned her back to him and sat down at her favorite desk.

ja: 一方、草十郎の前には安物のガラステーブルが一つ。
en: Soujuurou was left standing before a cheap-looking glass table.

ja: 「……なんか色々と慣れないな。
en: "I'm still really not used to all this.

ja: なあ蒼崎、この青いのなんだ？」
en: What's that blue thing over there, Aozaki?"

ja: 落ち着かないのか、草十郎は部屋の隅にたてかけられたギターを眺める。
en: Restless, Soujuurou found his eyes drawn to the guitar propped up in the corner.

ja: 「なんか薄いし青いしとんがってるし、きっと蒼崎の事だし。
en: "It's thin, blue and intense-looking, it's got your name written all over it.

ja: ……もしかしなくても、武器か？」
en: Don't tell me it's some kind of weapon?"

ja: 「楽器よそれ。エレキはともかく、アコギは音楽室で似たようなのあったでしょう。あとこれ以上<青青|あおあお>言ったら、そのとんがってるので殴るからね」
en: "It's a musical instrument. I understand if you've never seen an electric one, but you must've seen an acoustic guitar in the music room. Keep talking, though, and you'll soon see if it also works as a weapon."

ja: やっぱり武器じゃないか、という感想を<堪|こら>えて、草十郎もクッションに腰を下ろす。
en: Soujuurou plopped himself down onto a cushion, struggling to suppress the desire to retort that it was a weapon after all.

ja: 「ちょっとは落ち着きなさいよ。いつもは耳の遠い大型犬みたいに鈍感なクセに。何か気になるものでもあるの？」
en: "Don't play the victim. Usually you're as oblivious as an old and deaf dog. What's got you worked up this time?"

ja: この場合、鈍感なのは青子の方なのだが、
en: In fact it was Aoko who was oblivious for once.

ja: 草十郎もなぜ自分が落ち着かないのか分かっていないので、鈍感なのはお互い様である。
en: For his part, Soujuurou could not figure out why he felt so restless either. Suffice it to say, they were both pretty clueless in this moment.

ja: 「あ、もしかして内装？　この部屋の家具のグレードが居間とは違うから不思議がってるのね。
en: "Is it the way I decorated my room? My furniture's totally different to the stuff in the drawing room, so I understand if it seems a little weird.

ja: ここ、ベッド以外は私の家から持ちこんだ物なの。引っ越してから二年経つけど、まだ屋敷には馴染んでないでしょ？」
en: I brought everything from home except the bed. It's been two years since I moved here, but I still don't feel like me and my stuff belong in this big, old house."

ja: そわそわと落ち着かない草十郎の心情を曲解、納得いったのか、青子は自分の勉強を始めてしまう。
en: Though she misunderstood the real reason for Soujuurou's nervousness, Aoko seemed satisfied that she had resolved Soujuurou's anxiety for the time being and returned to her studies.

ja: 早送りのようにめくられていくノートと教科書。
en: She flipped through her notes and textbooks as if fast-forwarding a tape.

ja: そこに余人の立ち入る隙間はない。
en: There was no opening for an outsider like him to intrude in her high-speed study session.

ja: 青子の背中から立ち上るオーラに圧倒され、草十郎も気を引き締めてテーブルに向かった。
en: Repelled by her intensity, he retreated to his table. He was at least sensitive enough to pick up on her desire to be left alone.

ja: 完全に無視されていながら平然と自分の作業に入れるあたり、草十郎も只者ではない。
en: It was a testament to Soujuurou that having his needs utterly ignored was now second nature to him, to the extent that he could now happily go about his business in solitude.

ja: それから二時間。
en: Two hours passed.

ja: 十一時近くなって、ようやく青子の<集中力|スピード>が減速していった。
en: Then, as the clock neared eleven, Aoko's speed and concentration began to slip.

ja: それを<頃合|ころあ>いと見て、草十郎は凛と伸びた青子の背中に話しかけた。
en: Seeing his window of opportunity, Soujuurou seized the moment to strike up a conversation.

ja: 「蒼崎、ちょっといいかな」
en: "Aozaki, can I talk to you for a minute?"

ja: 「ん、なに？」
en: "What is it?"

ja: 遠慮がちな声に、青子は振り向かずに応えた。
en: She spoke hesitantly, not bothering to turn to face him.

ja: 減速しているといっても、青子のノートをめくる動作は止まらない。
en: She continued to flip the pages of her textbook, albeit at a slower speed than before.

ja: 「この三日間、蒼崎たちの夕食事情を見てきたけど。
en: "I noticed how you and Alice have been acting at dinner these past three days, and, uh...

ja: 君たちの食事はいつもああなのか？」
en: Is it always like that?"

ja: 「そうだけど、おかしい？」
en: "Yes, it's normal. Do we not look normal?"

ja: 「む……そう言われると困るな。
en: "Hm... I'm not sure how to answer that.

ja: ただ、学校じゃみんな楽しそうだった。誰かと食事を摂るって事は、ああいう風になるコトだって思ってた。だから、もしかすると」
en: It's just, at school people seem to enjoy eating together, so I thought it was strange that the two of you don't look like you enjoy it, and I thought maybe it's because of... you know..."

ja: 「もしかしないわよ。別にアンタのせいで有珠と話さないワケじゃないわ。私たちはいつもああだから」
en: "Don't worry, it's not because of you that we haven't been talking at mealtimes. We've never talked to each other during meals."

ja: 平然と語る青子の背中は、そんな事実をどうも思っていないようだった。
en: Aoko spoke calmly with her back still turned, seemingly unaware of what he was getting at.

ja: 「張りつめた食卓だな。
en: "Well, it can get pretty tense.

ja: 蒼崎と有珠は、仲がいいと思ってたのに」
en: And here I thought you two were close friends."

ja: 青子は否定も肯定もしない。
en: She neither confirmed nor denied his statement.

ja: ただ、草十郎の残念そうな呟きが、少しだけ意外だった。
en: She was, however, surprised by the disappointed tone in which he had made it.

ja: 「ま、張りつめた食卓っていうのは合ってるわね。
en: "You're not wrong. It can get tense.

ja: 有珠が何回アンタの飲み物にメスカリンを入れてたかなんてもう覚えてないし、昨日なんか堂々とサラダの中にナナカマドなんか混ざってるし。
en: I can't remember how many times she's put mescaline in your drink, and yesterday she was adding rowan to your salad.

ja: ……ほんと、あの娘なに考えてるんだろう」
en: ...Beats me what the hell she was thinking."

ja: 思い出すように苦笑しながら、青子は教科書をめくっていく。
en: A bitter smile spread across her face in reminiscence. The pages of her textbook continued to turn.

ja: 「メスカリン……？」
en: "Mescaline? What's that?"

ja: 「サボテンからとれる<植物塩基|アルカロイド>よ。有珠が使う以上、ただの幻覚剤じゃないでしょうけどね。……っと、私はこんなもんでいっか」
en: "It's a hallucinogenic alkaloid produced by the peyote cactus. I'm assuming it's more than just your average hallucinogen if Alice is using it, though... And I'm done!"

ja: そう言う彼女の手元で、ぱたん、と四冊目の教科書が閉じられた。
en: With that she slammed shut her fourth textbook of the night.

ja: 今まで微動だにしなかった背中がくるりと反転する。
en: After having scarcely changed position the whole night she finally turned in her chair to face him.

ja: 「さ、今度はアンタを仕込まなくちゃね。
en: "Now it's time to put you to work.

ja: 今日の四科目の答案、実に草十郎らしい出来栄えで卒倒しそうになったわ、私」
en: I don't know what else I was expecting, but I still almost fainted when I saw your scores."

ja: 口調は楽しそうに、けれど視線は不機嫌そうに、青子はあぐらをかく草十郎を見つめる。
en: Her tone was light but her gaze was heavy as she stared at Soujuurou, seated cross-legged on the floor.

ja: 「現国、地理、数学、電子工学。
en: "Modern literature, geography, math, and electronics...

ja: あの調子であと二日続けたら、冬休みが消えるのは当然でしょうね。そうなると困るのは私なのよ、実際」
en: If you don't up your grades over the next two days your winter break is as good as gone. And that'll be more of a problem for me than you."

ja: 「いや、俺も困るぞ。休みなのに学校に行くのは、なんか気が乗らない」
en: "I disagree. I think it'll be worse. Going to school during the break would not work out for me."

ja: 冷静に誤りを訂正する草十郎。
en: Soujuurou calmly corrected her.

ja: 「そりゃあ私の台詞だ！　アンタが学校に行くってコトは、必然、こっちまでとばっちりがくるっての！」
en: "For you?! If you have to go to school over the break, what do you think will happen to me?"

ja: 思い出したくもない、山城教諭のニヤニヤ顔を想像してしまう青子だった。
en: All she could think about, as much as she tried not to, was Mr. Yamashiro and his annoying grin.

ja: 「それ以前に、私の目が黒いうちはオール赤なんて<生徒|ヤツ>は許さない。
en: "I cannot allow any student to fail every single class. Not on my watch.

ja: 本来なら性根から叩き直すところだけど……」
en: If I could beat good grades out of you I would."

ja: 「ま、アンタは色々事情があるから、とりあえず点数だけで勘弁してあげる。
en: "Lucky for you, you have 'extenuating circumstances,' shall we say, so I'll give you a pass just this once.

ja: 私もテストは一夜漬けで片付ける方だから、アンタ一人仕込むのに、そう時間はかからないだろうし」
en: A good all-nighter is usually enough for me to prepare for exams, so it shouldn't take too long to get you up to speed either."

ja: 青子の宣言に、草十郎は露骨に表情を曇らせる。
en: Soujuurou's expression openly soured in response to her declaration.

ja: そんなお節介はいらない、とでも言いたげな顔である。
en: It was obvious he did not think he needed her meddling in his studies.

ja: 「アンタね。苦労するのは私と貴方、どっちだと思う？」
en: "Oh, please. Which of us do you think is going to have the harder time of it, me or you?"

ja: 間違いなく自分だな、と運命的に悟りながらも草十郎は静かにうなだれた。
en: Soujuurou got the feeling that it would be him, but he nodded slowly nonetheless.

ja: どのみち断ったところで断りきれるはずがないし、青子の言う通り、苦労の度合いは彼女の方が大きいだろう。
en: Then again, it would probably take more effort on her part than on his, and in any case he knew there was no way to talk her out of it.

ja: 「……この度は、ご迷惑をおかけします」
en: "...I feel bad for making you do this."

ja: 観念と感謝の意をこめて、ぺこりと一礼する草十郎。
en: Soujuurou summarily bowed his head to show gratitude and willingness to work.

ja: 「よろしい。
en: "Good.

ja: 安心なさい、私だって鬼じゃないから。
en: And don't worry, I'm not a demon, like they say.

ja: 別に平均点狙うってワケでもなし、予定通りこなしていけば三時には眠れるわよ」
en: You can get less than average marks and still pass. You'll probably be able to go to bed by three."

ja: 殊勝な教え子の態度に、青子は満足そうに頷いた。
en: She nodded with satisfaction, pleased by his studious attitude.

ja: ほんとうに色々問題のある草十郎だが、この素直さがあれば大抵のコトはなんとか出来てしまうだろう、と。
en: He had plenty of obstacles ahead of him, but that sense of humility might be enough to see him through.

ja: 「……って、なにホトケ心だしてるんだ私。
en: "Wait, what was I thinking? I can't afford to be this soft on you."

ja: いい、静希君？　このあと頼られちゃたまんないから<釘|くぎ>さしておくけど、私がマンツーマンで誰かを仕込むなんてコト、滅多にないから。
en: Shizuki, let me be straight about this... temporary arrangement. It's not every day I offer private, one-on-one lessons like this.

ja: これはあくまで、異例中の異例だって覚えておいてね」
en: This is beyond rare, an exception among exceptions. And don't you go forgetting that."

ja: 自分に言い聞かせるような青子の宣言に、えー、と顔を曇らせる草十郎。
en: She spoke more to convince herself than him, but his expression still darkened.

ja: その顔の上に“拾ってください”なんて単語を連想してしまい、自らの甘さにうなだれる青子だった。
en: It made one want to hang a side around his neck that read, "please take me home," like an abandoned pet. Aoko chided herself for being so soft.

ja: そう言えば、初めて出会った日は雨だったっけ、などと思いながら。
en: For some reason, in that moment she recalled that it had been raining the day they met each other.

ja: ……時間は、砂が落ちるようにすぎていく。
en: Time passed like the falling grains of an hourglass.
"...Finished."

ja: 窓から差しこむ朝の光に目を細めて、青子は何杯目かの紅茶を飲み干した。
en: Aoko squinted as light poured through the window and she downed another cup of tea. She had lost count of exactly how many she had drank long ago.

ja: 「一晩かかったね、蒼崎」
en: "And it only took the whole night, eh, Aozaki?"

ja: 不思議だ、とばかりに青子の独白を拾う草十郎。
en: Soujuurou picked up on what she left unspoken.

ja: 青子にはいつもの覇気がない。
en: Aoko had used up all her pep.

ja: 徹夜明けプラス、一晩じゅう草十郎を怒鳴りつけた疲労のためだ。
en: In staying up all night, but also in shouting at him.

ja: 一方、草十郎は昨夜とまったく同じ顔色である。
en: He looked pale and uncomfortable, just as he had all night long.

ja: 「……ええ。甘く見てたわ、アンタの事を」
en: "I underestimated you, Soujuurou Shizuki."

ja: 「だから、誉めても何も出ないって」
en: "Come on, Aozaki, you know I get weirded out when you compliment me."

ja: 「ある意味、誉めるに値するかもね……」
en: "No, no. You deserve a pat on the head."

ja: 呆れる青子だが、半分は本気で感心していた。
en: She was at the end of her rope, but she could not help the bit of pride that swelled up in her.

ja: この山奥育ちには下積みがなさすぎる。
en: His lack of even the most basic comprehension was shocking, even taking into account his upbringing in the wilderness.

ja: 控えめに言うと、かろうじて中学生レベルの学力だ。
en: His ability was that of a middle school student, and that was being generous.

ja: なので、理解、修得を目的にした試験勉強は諦めるしかない。
en: Preparing him for exams by teaching him new concepts and ideas was a waste of time.

ja: 基本は点数稼ぎの暗記だけ。
en: Rote memorization was his only hope for passing.

ja: 明日になれば忘れるハリボテの一夜漬けでいい、と青子は教官役を買ってでたのだ。
en: Everything he memorized could collapse like a house of cards afterwards for all she cared. So long as he remembered for his exams.

ja: ……誤算だったのは、思いの外、この生徒が優秀だった事だろう。
en: Assuming he had the capacity to be a good student in the first place had been her mistake.

ja: 四教科の試験範囲を終えるのに一晩かかってしまったが、それでもここまで熱心に、覚えたことを無駄にしないよう真剣に取り組むとは思わなかった。
en: It took all night to cover the content for just four exams, and she still did not feel confident he could apply what he so earnestly tried to memorize.

ja: 「でもねぇ。真面目なのはいいコトだけど、アンタ、暗記するのに時間かかりすぎ」
en: "I appreciate your effort, but you just take too long to memorize new information."

ja: 「そこは大目に見てほしい。今まで、頭より体で覚えるコトのが多かったんだ」
en: "Come on, go easy on me. I'm used to learning things with my body, not my head."

ja: 青子は仕方なさげにため息をつく。
en: Aoko let out an exasperated sigh.

ja: たしかに、山奥での生活で重要なのは知識ではなく経験則なのだろう、と。
en: Naturally, physical prowess mattered more in mountain life than the intellectual kind, but still.

ja: 「……まあいいわ。これで山城からアンタの成績について相談される事もないでしょうし。
en: "Whatever. At least now you should do well enough to satisfy Yamashiro.

ja: 紅茶、もう一杯<淹|い>れてくれる？」
en: Mind making some more tea?"

ja: 疲れきって背中を伸ばす青子に、はいはいと応えて立ち上がる草十郎。
en: Soujuurou stood up and obeyed, as Aoko stretched her aching back.

ja: ティーバッグの紅茶は大量に買いこんでいたらしく、まだ十分に余っている。
en: She had apparently bought the tea bags in bulk, so there were still plenty to use.

ja: 「まったく。無駄遣いだな、蒼崎は」
en: "Good grief. This is so wasteful."

ja: 青子に聞こえないよう呟く。
en: He spoke under his breath so she wouldn't hear.

ja: 一晩<厳|きび>しく教えられた反撃か、青子のだらしのない点が見られて嬉しいらしい。
en: It made him somehow happy to see her so tired and unfocused after the grueling all-night lesson she had given him.

ja: ……その買いすぎたティーバッグは失敗ではなく、<今|・><夜|・>の補給物資になる事を、この時点では想像もできない草十郎だった。
en: It did not cross his mind that the excess tea bags, far from being an indulgent purchase, were purchased intentionally to sustain them through the night.

ja: そんな平和ぼけしまくった草十郎を、青子は弛緩した面持ちで眺めている。
en: A relaxed expression came across Aoko's face as she watched him, naive and peaceful as could be.
